text: So, what can you expect to have achieved by the end of the module? Firstly, you should understand advanced profiling principles. You should be able to recognise 6 day types that occur in profiling. You should be able to determine when a market is in balance or out of balance. Determine who is in control at different points in the auction process. Identify and use key profile metrics like the high volume node, low volume node, tails and gaps. • Develop your own unique strategies with advanced understanding of profiling techniques • Identify the four different types of open patterns • Interpret trade location and variation of price within the value area • Trade location within the value area and range, including three different variations • And lastly, the open trade and the four types of patterns that occur within the
